Part A

We will work with the symmetric matrix S=
[ -0.217706  -0.450805  -0.277861  -0.225232  -0.242284 ]
[ -0.450805  -0.763152  0.0410486   0.578698   0.343912 ]
[ -0.277861  0.0410486  -0.740668  -0.550602   0.852047 ]
[ -0.225232   0.578698  -0.550602 -0.0746731   0.132576 ]
[ -0.242284   0.343912   0.852047   0.132576   0.343402 ]

Jacobi diagonalization...

Matrix of eigenvalues of S, D=
[  -1.47404 -5.99506e-17 -1.86657e-25 -2.22383e-28 3.33478e-32 ]
[-8.77705e-17   -1.19583 -8.28221e-25 -2.52262e-29 8.84959e-44 ]
[-1.34417e-17 -7.37387e-18  -0.350426 -3.94427e-31 -2.35727e-51 ]
[1.62447e-17 -1.81466e-17 -6.88129e-18   0.528166          0 ]
[1.50023e-17 -7.38097e-18 -2.90788e-17 3.12226e-17    1.03933 ]

Matrix of eigenvectors of S, V=
[  0.137329   0.325839  -0.821201  -0.262106  -0.363181 ]
[ -0.130471   0.866514  0.0738852    0.38009   0.286712 ]
[   0.80489   0.146601   0.139022  -0.387666   0.401307 ]
[  0.427387  -0.286297  -0.342083   0.777594   0.117057 ]
[ -0.365527  -0.198809  -0.428746  -0.178594   0.781759 ]

Check that V^T*S*V = D: 
[  -1.47404 -1.80411e-16 -1.66533e-16 3.33067e-16 -1.66533e-16 ]
[-1.11022e-16   -1.19583 -2.22045e-16 -1.11022e-16 -1.94289e-16 ]
[-9.71445e-17 -1.31839e-16  -0.350426 -1.31839e-16 -1.94289e-16 ]
[2.56739e-16 -8.67362e-17 -1.59595e-16   0.528166 -1.66533e-16 ]
[-1.11022e-16 -1.66533e-16 -1.66533e-16 -1.94289e-16    1.03933 ]

Check that V*D*V^T = S: 
[ -0.217706  -0.450805  -0.277861  -0.225232  -0.242284 ]
[ -0.450805  -0.763152  0.0410486   0.578698   0.343912 ]
[ -0.277861  0.0410486  -0.740668  -0.550602   0.852047 ]
[ -0.225232   0.578698  -0.550602 -0.0746731   0.132576 ]
[ -0.242284   0.343912   0.852047   0.132576   0.343402 ]

Check that V^T*V = 1: 
[         1          0 8.32667e-17 -9.71445e-17          0 ]
[         0          1 2.63678e-16 -1.52656e-16 5.55112e-17 ]
[8.32667e-17 2.63678e-16          1 -6.93889e-17 -1.11022e-16 ]
[-9.71445e-17 -1.52656e-16 -6.93889e-17          1 -1.38778e-16 ]
[         0 5.55112e-17 -1.11022e-16 -1.38778e-16          1 ]
